ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 128 cores x 4 FP32/cycle (NEON 128-bit) x 2 (FMA) = 1024 FP32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp64: 128 cores x 2 FP64/cycle (NEON) x 2 (FMA) = 512 FP64 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp16: 128 cores x 8 FP16/cycle (NEON) x 2 (FMA) = 2048 FP16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 128 cores x 16 INT8/cycle (NEON) x 2 = 4096 INT8 ops/clock

theoretical_peaks_notes: Calculated at 3000 MHz. Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
notes: 128-core ARM server processor based on Neoverse N1. Single-threaded cores with 128-bit NEON SIMD. No SMT, no BF16.
